name: transitdata-apc-protobuf-json-transformer
description: Transform APC messages from Protobuf back to JSON

scripts.build: npm run build:passenger-count && npm run build:expanded-apc && npm run build:src
scripts.build:passenger-count: mkdir -p ./src/protobuf && rm -f ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.* && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 --out ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.js ./protos/passenger-count.proto && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 ./protos/passenger-count.proto | pbts --out ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.d.ts - && prettier --write ./src/protobuf/passengerCount.{js,d.ts}
scripts.build:expanded-apc: mkdir -p ./src/quicktype && rm -f ./src/quicktype/expandedApc.ts && quicktype --out ./src/quicktype/expandedApc.ts --top-level ExpandedApcMessage --lang ts --src-lang json --src ./quicktype/expanded-apc --no-date-times --alphabetize-properties --all-properties-optional --telemetry disable --converters all-objects && prettier --write ./src/quicktype/expandedApc.ts && export TMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && echo '// @ts-nocheck' > "${TMPFILE}" && cat ./src/quicktype/expandedApc.ts >> "${TMPFILE}" && mv "${TMPFILE}" ./src/quicktype/expandedApc.ts
scripts.check-and-build: npm run build:passenger-count && npm run build:expanded-apc && npm run ts:check && npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint && npm run test && npm run build

author: haphut <haphut@mistmap.com>
